channel.title: Anyone have ::setnpc
channel.description:
I need a command (or anything really) that triggers a npc change, i.e. it replaces 1 npc with another, I was looking at the moparscape 3.2 client, and apparently it has a command for that, but i couldn't find it.
My attempts at making my own has just resulted in crashes.
So, if anyone has anything which switches 2 npc's that'd be great (If someone has posted one already feel free to post another, it'd be nice to see different ways of doing it)

I need a command (or anything really) that triggers a npc change, i.e. it replaces 1 npc with another,
